question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.
Please answer the following questions.
During the THREE MONTHS PRIOR to the onset of the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis in your area, how often you feel the way described in each of the following statements.
… how often did you feel that you lacked companionship?
option_text: Hardly Ever, Some of the time, Often

question_text: … how often did you feel left out?
option_text: Hardly Ever, Some of the time, Often

question_text: … how often did you feel isolated from others?
option_text: Hardly Ever, Some of the time, Often
